group_1.narration: [textBlack:But if everyone does what is good,]@[textBlack:that’s the best happiness, right?]@[textBlack:So I think my mother will forgive me.]

[textBlack:I thought about it again, however,]@[textBlack:and decided that rather than be saved]@[textBlack:in such a manner, it would be]@[textBlack:these young people’s true happiness]@[textBlack:for us all to go as we were before God.]

[textBlack:In truth, any hardship at all, if it’s]@[textBlack:experienced along the way of righteousness,]@[textBlack:is just a step bringing us closer to]@[textBlack:true happiness; both the climb up the pass]@[textBlack:and the climb down bring us closer.]
[textBlack:To attain the truest happiness]@[textBlack:you must first know all kinds of sorrow,]@[textBlack:for such is God's will.]
[textBlack:I wouldn’t mind being like the scorpion]@[textBlack:and having my body burnt a hundred times]@[textBlack:over as long as it really was for]@[textBlack:the sake of everyone’s happiness.]

group_1.textCenter: (...Happiness comes in many forms,@even in this book…)
(When you do something for the good of others…@you also receive happiness…)
(The teacher said that we shouldn’t force @ourselves to find an answer…)

group_1.textLeft: You’ve been contemplating the meaning @of "true happiness"?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, but we couldn’t come up @with a good answer…

group_1.textLeft: It’s a difficult question. @You don’t have to force a conclusion.
If you can find the answer someday @in the future, that’s okay.
I’m sure you’ll come to understand the meaning @of this assignment.

group_1.textCenter: (In the end, I didn’t get along with Rena @very well…)
(Ui’s attending the elementary school,@so her classes are already over.)

group_1.textRight: Hey.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Waaah?!

group_1.textRight: Where do you live?

group_1.textLeft: I-I live at a place called Mikazuki Villa @in Shinsei Ward…

group_1.textRight: I see… So we’re going the same direction. @Let’s go.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, um…

group_1.narration: "It’s your first day at a brand new school,@and by the looks of it you haven’t made any friends,@so I suppose I’ll just have to walk you home today!"

group_1.textLeft: Th-thank you…Miss Minami!

group_1.textRight: …You can just call me Rena.

group_1.textLeft: Oh! I’m Iroha! @It’s nice to meet you, Rena!

group_1.textCenter: Wh-wh-who’s that scary girl next to you?@It looks like she’s glaring at me…

group_1.textLeft: …huh? What’s with you? Rude much?

group_1.textRight: Oh man… It’s b-because you keep scowling @at me like that!

group_1.textLeft: L-look I’m not glaring at you! @This is just my face!

group_1.textRight: Oh wow… You must have it rough, huh?

group_1.textLeft: You’re really pissing me off!

group_1.textCenter: Ah, um…er, please don’t fight with each other…

group_1.textLeft: Don’t get lost now, you hear.

group_1.textRight: Yeah! See you both later!

group_1.textCenter: (I’m sure school will be a lot more fun @from now on…)

group_1.textRight: Is that you, Sis?

group_1.textLeft: Yachiyo! And Ui! Are you out shopping?

group_1.textRight: Yes, Ui has been a big help for me.
By the way, were you just with Kaede?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, and Rena, who’s in the same class as me.

group_1.textRight: It looks like you’ve made some friends @at school, then.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! We were seated next to each other @and teamed up for partner discussions…

group_1.textRight: And what sort of things did you discuss?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, we were supposed to discuss themes @from a book we read.
What does "true happiness" mean @to you, Yachiyo?

group_1.textRight: Aah, you’re reading "Night on the Galactic @Railroad"?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, although I still haven’t found @my answer yet…

group_1.textRight: I see…

group_1.textCenter: If my sister and I can restore my family’s @great name…
Then surely we’ll be able to find true happiness!

group_1.textRight: [chara:100201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][chara:100101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eek?!
…Please, don’t scare us like that.

group_1.textLeft: Who’s this, Yachiyo…?

group_1.textRight: She’s from a Chinese restaurant nearby that I sometimes order delivery from.
I know her older sister, so you could call her @a family friend.
These must be the two girls who moved @in recently!
I’m Tsuruno Yui, poster girl of Chinese @Restaurant Banbanzai! Yep yep!
Call me Tsuruno! Nice to meetcha!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, it’s a pleasure to m-meet you too!
I don’t think I ordered anything today?

group_1.textRight: I’m here to advertise and pass along a message @from my sister! First the flier!
And second, here’s the message.
Please consider doing an online commercial @for the restaurant!

group_1.textLeft: It’s been so long since I’ve done any modeling…
Is the business in such dire straits that it’s @up to me to save it?

group_1.textRight: Well, we’re always being supported @by our patrons!
Anyways, I’m off to my next delivery!
See you later!

group_1.textLeft: She blows in and out like a hurricane…

group_1.narration: After that, we went home for dinner and @discussed what "true happiness" meant together.

group_1.textRight: You want to know what true happiness is?

group_1.textLeft: That’s right, I want to hear your opinion.

group_1.textRight: Well…I’m healthy and happy every day.
There’s no strife, and I have my lovely @granddaughter and Sana to take care of me.
And I have you and Ui… @Everyone is here with me.
I think this is a very happy time for me.

group_1.textLeft: It’s the same for me… This time spent around @this dinner table is the happiest of all.
And my work here at Mikazuki Villa…
I find it very rewarding to meet all the people @who stay here.
A good example would be like hearing @about Kanae’s news.

group_1.textRight: I was…so worried about my home life @among other things…
There were even times when I wanted @to disappear completely.
But I said everything I wanted to say to them @and moved out…
And now I’m here…and I’m @with my second family.
I’m happy I can be more honest with myself @than before…

group_1.textLeft: You’ve grown so much stronger @since then, Sana.

group_1.textRight: Um…that’s…

group_1.textLeft: It’s a compliment. *Giggle*
I was really sick until a little while ago.
But now I can go to school like everyone else!
I’m really happy with my new life @at Mikazuki Villa.
I’m beyond happy right now!

group_1.textRight: Well… Good health is the best thing anyone @could ask for.
…I’m not sure of the right answer, do you think @you can figure something out, Iroha?

group_1.textLeft: I don’t know… The answer is still so unclear.
Karin’s story this morning is still troubling me.
I think I’m happy right now… But maybe that’s @because nothing bad has happened.
Maybe that’s not the right way to put it…

group_1.textRight: Who knows? I think that’s a wonderful kind @of happiness.
Yes, there is nothing more precious than @day-to-day life.
Besides, there are many forms of happiness.

group_1.textLeft: …You’re right.

group_1.narration: There’s no need to rush… @I can take all the time I need @to find my answer…
At least, everyone’s smiles when they think @about what makes them happy… @That’s something important and precious.
